#Text=Make Owning a Dog Easier
#Text=Steps
#Text=Be sure you have time to take care of the dog .
#Text=You have to be home at all times or most of the times , but being home all day might give you more time to take care of the dog .
#Text=Your dog may be uncomfortable around you if you do n’t have the time .
#Text=You need to have a dog that is less playful while indoors .
#Text=Aim for a breed that is smart .
#Text=That will help to take care of the dog .
#Text=Buy weeks worth of dog food , so you do n't have to go and get food everyday .
#Text=But you need to read the lables to make sure the food doesnt get old , or you can give your dog the amount of food that will be enough and will not be wasted .
#Text=Potty train your dog
#Text=.
#Text=You will need a leash and a pad .
#Text=When your dog will need to go to the bathroom , which you can tell if your dog is whining or having an excretion , you take your dog to the pad .
#Text=Repeat the same thing for a week .
#Text=If your dog still does n’t get it , then continue doing the same thing .
#Text=For potty training outdoors , you need to see which area outside is avalible for your dog to potty .
#Text=You need to pick it up with a plastic bag .
#Text=Turn the bag around and throw it out .
#Text=You need to do this everyday until your dog knows which area to potty in .
#Text=Walk your dog
#Text=in the morning .
#Text=Wake up the dog before getting your dog because you need to wake up early to walk your dog .
#Text=If your dog is n’t awake yet , you still need to get up and wait for your dog to get up .
#Text=It ’s ok if your dog does n’t wake up , because then you know when to wake up .
#Text=Giving your dog a bath might be easier by taking your dog to the groomers .
#Text=You can also do it at home , but in a tub with dog shampoo .
#Text=You may need a dogsitter to take care of your dog while you ’re not home .
#Text=Tips
#Text=it makes it easier to own a dog if you get a calm dog like the old english bulldog

#Text=it is a good idea to get your friends or a family member to take care of your dog while you are not hom because your dog will get to know the people in your life . it is easier if you com home soon to take care of your dog
#Text=Warnings
#Text=make sure to bring your dog to the vet and the vet will tell you when to feed your dog what to feed your dog and all the other information . make sure that the dog is safe and doesnt bite
#Text=warn the person about the dog what it need and the information
